name: cifti-restrict-dense-map
author: Washington University School of Medicin
description:
Exclude brainordinates from a cifti file.

Writes a modified version of <cifti-in>, where all brainordinates outside the specified roi(s) are removed from the file.  The direction can be either an integer starting from 1, or the strings 'ROW' or 'COLUMN'.  If -cifti-roi is specified, no other -*-roi option may be specified.  If not using -cifti-roi, any -*-roi options not present will discard the relevant structure, if present in the input file.

inputs.name: direction
inputs.description: which dimension to change the mapping on (integer, 'ROW', or 'COLUMN')

inputs.name: opt_cifti_roi_roi_cifti
inputs.description: cifti file containing combined rois: the rois as a cifti file

inputs.name: opt_left_roi_roi_metric
inputs.description: vertices to use from left hemisphere: the left roi as a metric file

inputs.name: opt_right_roi_roi_metric
inputs.description: vertices to use from right hemisphere: the right roi as a metric file

inputs.name: opt_cerebellum_roi_roi_metric
inputs.description: vertices to use from cerebellum: the cerebellum roi as a metric file

inputs.name: opt_vol_roi_roi_vol
inputs.description: voxels to use: the roi volume file
